title: Grand Diamond and Gemstone 'Addigai' Necklace - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: 6 pieces + 0.01 carats in the locket). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring luster.
features: This Addigai features an intricate floral design and a captivating pendant. The piece showcases brilliant-cut diamonds masterfully set, interspersed with carefully placed emeralds and ruby accents for a touch of colour. Delicate golden droplets adorn the necklace and the locket, enhancing its regal appearance. The back of the necklace features a sturdy and comfortable adjustable chain for a perfect fit.
colors: with vibrant pops of green (emeralds) and subtle touches of red (rubies). This traditional color combination is highly auspicious.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for brides seeking traditional elegance and for any special occasion where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Addigai necklace is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship and elegance. The stunning combination of diamonds, emeralds, and rubies creates a breathtaking display of luxury. Its exquisite design and durable construction make it a cherished heirloom to be passed down through generations. A perfect embodiment of tradition and sophistication.
